I can help you determine the best way to save money. I can answer the following questions:

  • What are the pros and cons of savings through a bank savings account versus buying stocks, or investing in mutual funds or government bonds?
  • What are mutual funds and what different types are there?
  • Should I have different ways to invest for short term, middle term and long term money?
  • What is a smart strategy to coordinate savings in IRAs, Roth IRAs, 401Ks and non-retirement Savings?

I can help you with all your money saving needs. Contact me today for more information: 310-287-2095
